name: Eternal Glow
description:
In this stelar journey, the goal is to get as many points as you can, while avoiding the other color obstacles.

Get the stars of your color and avoid black stars!

- Take the role of Iris, an intergalactic alien-octopus that can change colors to overcome her obstacles.

- Be careful of the black stars, as they will make the game harder, better, faster and stronger!

- White stars allow you to overcome any obstacle ahead!
